languages.text: "Надзирателям удалось локализовать бунтарей в добывающих комплексах, но штурм приведет к высоким потерям среди рабочей силы. В то же время невольники готовы сами сложить оружие и покаяться, если Вольный Торговец проявит милосердие к их плачевному положению и велит надзирателям умерить строгость и прекратить расправы".

"The overseers have managed to isolate the rebels inside the mining facilities, but an assault would result in high losses of workforce. On the other hand, the prisoners are ready to lay down their weapons, cease this violence, and repent if the Rogue Trader would only demonstrate some compassion toward their plight, possibly by reforming some of the more severe punishments."
languages.original_text: "Надзирателям удалось локализовать бунтарей в добывающих комплексах, но штурм приведет к высоким потерям среди рабочей силы. В то же время невольники готовы сами сложить оружие и покаяться, если Вольный Торговец проявит милосердие к их плачевному положению и велит надзирателям умерить строгость и прекратить расправы".

traits.locale_text: "The wardens have managed to isolate the rebels inside the mining facilities, but an assault would result in the high labour power losses. On the other hand, the slaves are ready to lay down their weapons and repent if the Rouge Trader would show compassion towards their plight and order the warden to act less severe and stop the violence."

"The wardens have managed to isolate the rebels inside the mining facilities, but an assault would result in the high labour power losses. On the other hand, the slaves are ready to lay down their weapons and repent if the Rouge Trader would show compassion towards their plight and order the warden to act less severe and stop the violence."

On the other hand, the slaves are ready to lay down their weapons, cease this violence, and repent if the Rouge Trader would only demonstrate some compassion towards their plight, possibly by reforming some of the more severe punishments."

On the other hand, the slaves are ready to lay down their weapons, cease this violence, and repent if the Rouge Trader would only demonstrate some compassion towards their plight, possibly by reforming some of the more severe punishments."

On the other hand, the prisoners are ready to lay down their weapons, cease this violence, and repent if the Rogue Trader would only demonstrate some compassion toward their plight, possibly by reforming some of the more severe punishments."

"The overseers have managed to isolate the rebels inside the mining facilities, but an assault would result in high losses of workforce. On the other hand, the prisoners are ready to lay down their weapons, cease this violence, and repent if the Rogue Trader would only demonstrate some compassion toward their plight, possibly by reforming some of the more severe punishments."

languages.text: “监察员已经把暴乱分子隔离在了采矿设施之中。如果我们发动袭击，会导致损失大量劳动力。除此之外，那些囚犯也想要放下武器，结束这场暴乱。如果您能对他们的境遇表现出同情的态度，改变某些过于严厉的惩罚措施的话，他们愿意结束这场暴力行为，忏悔自己的罪行。”
languages.original_text: "The overseers have managed to isolate the rebels inside the mining facilities, but an assault would result in high losses of workforce. On the other hand, the prisoners are ready to lay down their weapons, cease this violence, and repent if the Rogue Trader would only demonstrate some compassion toward their plight, possibly by reforming some of the more severe punishments."

traits.locale_text: “监察员已经把暴乱分子隔离在了采矿设施之中。如果我们发动袭击，会导致损失大量劳动力。除此之外，那些囚犯也想要放下武器，结束这场暴乱。如果您能对他们的境遇表现出同情的态度，改变某些过于严厉的惩罚措施的话，他们愿意结束这场暴力行为，忏悔自己的罪行。”

languages.text: «Los supervisores han conseguido aislar a los rebeldes en las instalaciones mineras, pero un asalto causaría grandes bajas entre nuestra mano de obra. Por otro lado, los prisioneros están listos para deponer las armas, abandonar la violencia y arrepentirse si su Comerciante Independiente demuestra compasión ante su situación, como, por ejemplo, reformando los castigos más severos».
languages.original_text: "The overseers have managed to isolate the rebels inside the mining facilities, but an assault would result in high losses of workforce. On the other hand, the prisoners are ready to lay down their weapons, cease this violence, and repent if the Rogue Trader would only demonstrate some compassion toward their plight, possibly by reforming some of the more severe punishments."

traits.locale_text: «Los supervisores han conseguido aislar a los rebeldes en las instalaciones mineras, pero un asalto causaría grandes bajas entre nuestra mano de obra. Por otro lado, los prisioneros están listos para deponer las armas, abandonar la violencia y arrepentirse si su Comerciante Independiente demuestra compasión ante su situación, como, por ejemplo, reformando los castigos más severos».

languages.text: 「看守たちは鉱山の施設内で反乱者たちを孤立させることに成功しましたが、襲撃で多くの労働力が失われることになります。でもその一方で、囚人たちは武器を捨て、この暴力をやめる心づもりをしています。ローグトレーダーが彼らの窮状を憐れみ、厳格な罰のいくつかを変えれば、彼らは悔い改めるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "The overseers have managed to isolate the rebels inside the mining facilities, but an assault would result in high losses of workforce. On the other hand, the prisoners are ready to lay down their weapons, cease this violence, and repent if the Rogue Trader would only demonstrate some compassion toward their plight, possibly by reforming some of the more severe punishments."

traits.locale_text: 「看守たちは鉱山の施設内で反乱者たちを孤立させることに成功しましたが、襲撃で多くの労働力が失われることになります。でもその一方で、奴隷たちは武器を捨て、この暴力をやめる心づもりをしています。ローグトレーダーが彼らの窮状を憐れみ、厳格な罰のいくつかを変えれば、彼らは悔い改めるでしょう」
「看守たちは鉱山の施設内で反乱者たちを孤立させることに成功しましたが、襲撃で多くの労働力が失われることになります。でもその一方で、奴隷たちは武器を捨て、この暴力をやめる心づもりをしています。ローグトレーダーが彼らの窮状を憐れみ、厳格な罰のいくつかを変えれば、彼らは悔い改めるでしょう」

languages.text: « Les contremaîtres ont réussi à isoler les rebelles à l'intérieur des installations minières, mais attaquer l'endroit entraînerait de lourdes pertes en termes de main-d'œuvre. Cela étant dit, les détenus sont prêts à déposer les armes, à cesser toute violence et à se repentir si {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} accepte de faire preuve de compassion à leur égard en allégeant, par exemple, certains châtiments jugés trop sévères. »
languages.original_text: "The overseers have managed to isolate the rebels inside the mining facilities, but an assault would result in high losses of workforce. On the other hand, the prisoners are ready to lay down their weapons, cease this violence, and repent if the Rogue Trader would only demonstrate some compassion toward their plight, possibly by reforming some of the more severe punishments."

traits.locale_text: « Les contremaîtres ont réussi à isoler les rebelles à l'intérieur des installations minières, mais attaquer l'endroit entraînerait de lourdes pertes en termes de main-d'œuvre. Cela étant dit, les détenus sont prêts à déposer les armes, à cesser toute violence et à se repentir si {mf|le|la} libre-{mf|marchand|marchande} accepte de faire preuve de compassion à leur égard en allégeant, par exemple, certains châtiments jugés trop sévères. »

languages.text: "Es ist den Aufsehern gelungen, die Rebellen in den Minen zu isolieren. Ein Angriff würde aber zu großen Verlusten unter den Arbeitern führen. Andererseits sind die Gefangenen bereit, ihre Waffen niederzulegen, dieser Gewalt ein Ende zu setzen und Buße zu tun, wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ein wenig Mitgefühl für ihr Leid zeigt. Vielleicht, indem einige der härtesten Strafen abgeschafft werden."
languages.original_text: "The overseers have managed to isolate the rebels inside the mining facilities, but an assault would result in high losses of workforce. On the other hand, the prisoners are ready to lay down their weapons, cease this violence, and repent if the Rogue Trader would only demonstrate some compassion toward their plight, possibly by reforming some of the more severe punishments."

traits.locale_text: "Es ist den Aufsehern gelungen, die Rebellen in den Minen zu isolieren. Ein Angriff würde aber zu großen Verlusten unter den Arbeitern führen. Andererseits sind die Gefangenen bereit, ihre Waffen niederzulegen, dieser Gewalt ein Ende zu setzen und Buße zu tun, wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ein wenig Mitgefühl für ihr Leid zeigt. Vielleicht, indem einige der härtesten Strafen abgeschafft werden."

"Es ist den Wärtern gelungen, die Rebellen in den Minen zu isolieren. Ein Angriff würde aber zu großen Verlusten unter den Arbeitern führen. Andererseits sind die Sklaven bereit, ihre Waffen niederzulegen, dieser Gewalt ein Ende zu setzen und Buße zu tun, wenn {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} ein wenig Mitgefühl für ihr Leid zeigt. Vielleicht, indem einige der härtesten Strafen abgeschafft werden."

languages.text: "Gözetmenler, isyancıları maden tesislerine kapatmayı başarmış olsa da bir taarruz başlatmak iş gücünde büyük kayıplara yol açacaktır. Öte yandan mahkûmlar, içlerinde bulundukları zor durumdan ötürü Hür Tacir'in bir nebze anlayış göstermesi hâlinde silah bırakıp şiddete son vereceklerini ve pişman olacaklarını belirttiler. Bunun için ağır cezalardan birine ıslahat getirmek gerekebilir."
languages.original_text: "The overseers have managed to isolate the rebels inside the mining facilities, but an assault would result in high losses of workforce. On the other hand, the prisoners are ready to lay down their weapons, cease this violence, and repent if the Rogue Trader would only demonstrate some compassion toward their plight, possibly by reforming some of the more severe punishments."
